column5: The power of the human heart Is not measured on a meter But by the passion it has  The power of the human heart Can't be seen by the naked eye But by the effect it has  The power of the human heart Is not powered by a machine But by the will it has  The power of the human heart Can't have a negative effect But by the strenth it has  A power so great A power so full The visions it can create The visions intact You can't put on an act
Yes this board is amazing love the smile on Jens face.
A MAJOR positive for internet boards. This place never ceases to amaze me. So many kind hearted people who just want to help one and other out.
Good on you Twilight Jen keep up the fight, your doing great!!! Thanks for posting Wayne

Picked a package up today at the post office and I'd like to publicly thank Nancy, on Jennifer's behalf, for the gift she sent her.  An envelope with a healthy handful of money in it (you shouldn't have Nancy!) and a nice fluffy bear, with a pouch for a heating bag in the back. It will help with the bone ache days that the anti-infection needle causes and maybe that heating bag can be frozen for when Jen's friends wheel her into TO's beerfest in her wheel chair this summer!   (we add humour where ever we can Nancy!)  Thanks from the bottom of our hearts Nancy, it arrived at the perfect time as the last two days Jen's been teetering on fever and we've all been up to 3am the last two nights. Today's she's back to normal and very tired, but this gift really picked up her spirit!
Gotta love this place.
Amazing place we have here!
Way to go Nancy your the queen of nice... Jen I hope you are feeling better soon.      Art
Good to hear!  Keep fighting Jen! Almost time for you and your dad to get out fishing
Good on ya... Keep fighting Jen
There's some awful amazing people out there that care a lot.
Forget the 'light' beer!  Looks like fuzzy will have multiple uses. Imagine all the events she could sneek her own drinks into!
Good on you Twilight   And thx Wayne for posting this. Nice to see these kinda things are still going on in our world.
Pretty much speaks for it,s self.
That's Awesome.  Very nice of you Nancy
In a word.... "Outstanding"
Kind of puts all the other recent trivial petty posts to shame.  Very nice gesture Nancy.
My eyes are wet and my face has a huge smile.
Very Nice!!!
Nancy that was very kind of you. Our OFC community ceases to amaze me when it comes to generosity.
Wayne, thank you for posting this. Twilight, your thoughtfullness will never be forgotten. Jen, you keep on fighting girl!!
Very nice Nancy. Good on ya!  :thumbsup_anim:
Twilight...you not only can catch "Gold"...you got a heart full of it too...  Best wishes for Jen...Wayne
Good on ya Nancy!  Onother reason to be proud of this comunity.
That's amazing  super group here.
Awesome!!!
